00029 #ifndef _MUX_EVT_EPD_H_
00030 #define _MUX_EVT_EPD_H_
00031 
00032 #include "muxBase.h"
00033 
00034 class   muxEvtEPD: public muxBase {
00035 typedef muxBase baseclass;
00036 public:
00037                 muxEvtEPD()
00038                 {       serverState = serverIdling;     // serve idle
00039                 }
00040         void    addpars(void);
00041         rec_typ REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00042         void    early(event *);
00043         void    late(event *);
00044         int     processItem(data *, queue *);
00045         int     export(exp_typ *);
00046 
00047         queue   qCBR;           // queue for non-AAL5 cells, high priority
00048 
00049         int     passEOF;        // TRUE: pass last cell of a rejected or currupted frame
00050 
00051         int     epdThresh;      // when to start dropping frames
00052         int     *vciFirst;      // TRUE: first cell of burst
00053         int     *vciOK;         // TRUE: cells can be queued
00054 
00055         enum    {serverIdling, serverSyncing, serverServing} serverState;
00056 
00057         inpstruct       *inp_buff_CBR, *inp_ptr_CBR;    // input buffer for non-AAL5 cells
00058 
00059         int     syncMode;       // TRUE: MODE=Sync
00060 };
00061
